definition: fork in road/bifurcation/branch in road, river, mountain range etc/to branch off/to turn off/to diverge/to stray (from the path)/to change the subject/to interrupt/to stagger (times)
mouth/classifier for things with mouths (people, domestic animals, cannons, wells etc)/classifier for bites or mouthfuls
At the Crossroads, famous opera, based on a story from 水滸傳|水浒传[Shui3 hu3 Zhuan4]

sentences.english: You finally reached the beginning of life, a journey of intersection. No, perhaps NO.
sentences.chinese: 你終於走到了人生的開端，第一個旅途的岔口。

sentences.english: Interrogating Hong Niang is a typical civil play, while this Crossroads belongs to military play.
sentences.chinese: 《拷紅》是典型的文戲，而《三岔口》屬於武戲。

sentences.english: We came to a fork in a road, and we couldn't decide whether to take the left or the right.
sentences.chinese: 我們走到一條路的岔口，不知該向左拐還是向右拐。

sentences.english: Go up to the fork and turn left.
Their paths diverged at the fork in the road.
sentences.chinese: 他們在道路的岔口處分道而行。

sentences.english: At the crossroads leading to the future, you stick to your choice of a small path.
sentences.chinese: 在通往未來的人生岔口，你堅定地選擇了這條小路。

sentences.english: Go to the fork and turn left.
Two paths diverge at the fork in the road.
sentences.chinese: 從大路岔口處分成兩條路。

sentences.english: They saw him to a fork in the road.
The play features scenes of hand-to-hand fighting between two actors wearing jacket and trousers.
sentences.chinese: 《三岔口》這齣戲主要由兩個演員進行短打表演。
